word: No human agent can supply that which will satisfy the hunger and thirst of the soul. But Jesus says, \93Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me\94 (Revelation 3:20). \93I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst\94 (John 6:35).
